mapper.select: SELECT p.board_no, p.board_title, CONCAT(SUBSTRING(p.board_content,1,15), '...') AS board_content, p.board_file, p.board_date, a.a_name, a.a_id FROM pet_boardview p JOIN admin a ON a.a_no=p.b_no WHERE board_cate=#{cate } ORDER BY board_no DESC LIMIT #{startPage }, #{lastPage }
